About

A Bit About Me

I'm a web developer and programmer based in the Greater Toronto Area. I recently graduated from Sheridan College. I spend my time learning different technologies to improve my skillset and enjoy making video games as a hobby.

Whether through coding or a paint brush, the expression of ideas stems from simple structures and patterns. To mediate this, is what I enjoy most about designing.

Science and technology has often been compared to magic. Realizing my code to solve problems and creating fun things is an amazing process which has that feeling of magic.

Every time I start a new project is a chance for oppurtunity. Whether involving a new stack or a new design pattern. No matter how small, every endeavor is a learning experience.

Crafted by: © Hassan Mahmood
